title: Google Is Letting You Claim a .Dad Dedicated Domain. Cue the Dad Jokes
description: Google’s new dedicated domain lets you join the growing sites dedicated to puns, pets, and mowing the lawn.

title: Twitter Rival Bluesky Has a Nudes Problem
description: In its chaotic early days, the platform’s algorithm shared naked pictures in its What’s Hot feed.

title: Twitter Really Is Worse Than Ever
description: Under Elon Musk, hate speech has surged and propaganda accounts have thrived.

title: Slack CEO Lidiane Jones Wants You to Stop Slacking So Much
description: We sat down to talk about work culture, automation, and also how to step away from the notifications (and your job).

title: Chinese VCs Lived the Silicon Valley High Life. Now the Party’s Over
description: Before the US cracked down on China’s tech sector, the country’s investors chased deals in California with Maseratis and Michelin-starred food.
